frame.name: Taking_time
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Activity</fen> takes some <fen>Time_length</fen> to complete. If an <fen>Agent</fen> is involved they may stand in metonymically for the <fen>Activity</fen>. For some LUs (e.g., <ment>fast</ment>, <ment>speedy</ment>) the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Activity</fen> is conceived of as taking less time than usual can be expressed.
<ex><fex name="Time_length">How long</fex> will <fex name="Activity">this</fex> <t>take</t>?</ex>
<ex><fex name="Activity">The ride</fex> <m>was</m> <t>speedy</t> and often bumpy.</ex>
<ex>Under high-pressure situations, <fex name="Agent">police officers</fex> <m>are</m> <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>fast</t> <fex name="Activity">at reacting to danger</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The event which requires some <fen>Time_length</fen> for completion.
<ex>Mona had a <t>speedy</t> <fex name="Activity">recovery</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition:
<def-root>The durational feature of the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="att">In actual experiential time</fex>, sorting the beads <t>takes</t> an extremely long time.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_length
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time required for the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>It'll only <t>take</t> <fex name="Time_length">20 seconds</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Time_length</fen> from the norm.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
<ex>That <t>took</t> an hour <fex name="Time">last week</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>Some specification of the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes a particular amount of time.
<ex><fex name="Circumstances">In the rain</fex>, biking to work <t>takes</t> me a lot longer</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>Duration is the length of time from the beginning of the <fen>Activity</fen> to its end.</def-root>
